sentences.en: Additionally , the mechanism of secretion of HPO was determined.

sentences.en: Dinitropheol exerted its effect on sucrose uptake or secretion into the sieve tubes.

sentences.en: Gastric secretion is reduced in volume and total acid content.

sentences.en: Hormone secretion is controlled by the pituitary gland.

sentences.en: In addition, excessive secretion of oil, water scarcity are also major factors.

sentences.en: My duodenum produces a substance called secretion, which empties into Joe's bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 我的十二指肠生产一种名叫分泌素的物质, 排入乔的血流.

sentences.en: Small doses depress salivary and bronchial secretion and sweating.
sentences.cn: 小剂量可抑制唾液分泌、支气管分泌及出汗.

sentences.en: The control of pancreatic secretion is performed mainly through 2 hormones.

sentences.en: Turn at least every 2 hours to encourage secretion drainage.
sentences.cn: 至少每两小时翻身一次,促进分泌物排出.

sentences.en: While olfaction means smelling the patient's odor of the secretion and excretion.
